idea-plugin.name: Kotlin MockK Test Generator
idea-plugin.description:
This is a simple testing plugin.
It allows you to generate tests for Kotlin code using MockK for mocks and JUnit4 for the test running engine
idea-plugin.change-notes:
10/3/2020 Added mockK mocking, default failing tests, and a bunch of use case testing.
11/3/2020 Bug fixes: Ignore protected functions in classes Remove class annotations Relaxed inner mocks Remove class init functions Support objects Support functions as param types in constructors
